hero.title: Exceptional Gastronomy
hero.subtitle: An unforgettable culinary experience in the heart of Provence

about.history_p1: Since our creation, we have committed to offering an exceptional culinary experience. Our team of passionate chefs draws from gastronomic traditions to create unique dishes.
about.history_p2: Every dish tells a story, every flavor evokes an emotion. We rigorously select our ingredients from local producers to guarantee freshness and quality.
about.history_p3: Our cuisine combines traditional techniques with modern innovations. We create taste harmonies that surprise and delight our guests in an elegant and refined setting.
about.services_p1: Our impeccable service adapts to your needs. Whether for a romantic dinner, business meal, or family celebration, we create the perfect atmosphere.
about.services_p2: We organize your custom events with high-quality service. Our private spaces offer the ideal setting for your important moments.
about.services_p3: Book your table now to experience an unforgettable gastronomic journey. Our team is at your disposal to personalize your visit.

reservation.map_notice: Your IP address will be sent to Google Maps.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.daily_description:
Every day at lunch
from Tuesday to Friday
(except public holidays)
our restaurant offers
a daily special at €14.00
or a set
daily special – dessert of your choice* at €19.00
menu.kids_description:
Syrup of choice or Diabolo
Homemade meatballs with Provençal tomato sauce
or sliced chicken in cream
with noodles or fresh fries
Scoop of ice cream of your choice
